if you want to get good practice and try using alot of smoke and mollys with a strategy. but if you have a busy life i would prefer you not to play this game seriously. play with friends and dont take it soo serious if not your going down a loop hole of addictions and lust for nutty shots and insane strategy. it is very unfortunate that i dont have friends soo im also solo , and carrying the noob A5S people in my team sucks.

Competitive is awful, you're required to win 10 games in order to be able to play with your friends. (competitive is the main mode in the game) and from the looks of things, there is no skill matchmaking when doing the games and you will almost always come up against 10 year veterans in 5 stacks. If you're new to the game, don't bother. Unless your fine with playing competitive on your own just to get outmatched constantly.
